title: Forgive & Forget
description:
Mike is anxiously awaiting Tommy Smokes announcement tomorrow (00:05:20). Jeff D Lowe joins to discuss his ear wax problems (00:08:00). A lot fo questions with this Paul Pelosi story (00:16:10). Tad, Drex & Kara get to the bottom of Perry's Runaway Dad situation. Nicolas Cage calls in with some new questions, Tom Brady and Gisele's finalize divorce & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
